column4: how do i reformat only ubuntu if i'm running winxp side-by-side so i don't reformat winxp also?
You can format or delete Ubuntu's partition, then use fixboot and fixmbr from Windows XP's boot CD (choose Recovery Console).
I'm using the 9.10 boot cd, how do I use the existing partitions?
Sorry, I'm busy now, please ask someone else.
